place: c/o Stanislaus Joyce, Via S. Nicolò 32, III, Trieste (Austria)
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Sir The proofs from Rome reached me this evening. I have corrected and returned them. I am quite satisfied with the binding and printing but would ask you kindly to put this year’s date on the frontispiece. I have also made one or two corrections of errors which escaped me on the first reading. Faithfully yours Jas A Joyce
